plugin_desc: Collect runtime metrics of ClickHouse instances, such as memory, disk, query events, etc., for performance monitoring, resource tracking, and fault diagnosis, ensuring stable database operation.
name: ClickHouse

metrics.name: clickhouse_asynchronous_metrics_uptime
metrics.description: Represents the uptime of the ClickHouse system.

metrics.name: clickhouse_metrics_memory_tracking
metrics.description: Indicates the current memory usage by the ClickHouse process.

metrics.name: clickhouse_asynchronous_metrics_os_memory_available
metrics.description: Indicates the total physical memory available for processes.

metrics.name: clickhouse_asynchronous_metrics_disk_used_default
metrics.description: Represents the amount of disk space currently used on the default disk.

metrics.name: clickhouse_asynchronous_metrics_disk_total_default
metrics.description: Displays the total capacity of the default disk.

metrics.name: clickhouse_events_query
metrics.description: Displays the number of queries processed per second by ClickHouse.

metrics.name: clickhouse_events_inserted_rows
metrics.description: Represents the rate of rows inserted during the last 5 minutes.

metrics.name: clickhouse_events_select_query
metrics.description: Represents the rate of SELECT queries processed during the last 5 minutes.

metrics.name: clickhouse_events_compressed_read_buffer_bytes
metrics.description: Displays the rate of compressed data read by ClickHouse system, indicating IO performance.

metrics.name: clickhouse_metrics_parts_active
metrics.description: Displays the number of active parts in the MergeTree tables.

metrics.name: clickhouse_metrics_parts_outdated
metrics.description: Shows the count of outdated parts in the MergeTree tables.

metrics.name: clickhouse_asynchronous_metrics_load_average1
metrics.description: Indicates the average system load over the last 1 minute.
